RelatedSentence: More ag organizations are voicing opposition to the USDA 's proposal to relax restrictions on imports of animal products from Brazil .

A1: additional concerns about loosening restrictions on imports
RelatedSentence: Recent revelations about the state of livestock health and food safety standards in Brazil raise additional concerns about loosening restrictions on imports .

Brazil has a history of foot - and - mouth disease outbreaks among livestock , but recently bovine spongiform encephalopathy ( BSE ) , another contagious animal disease , was confirmed in Mato Grosso , a state in the region of Brazil from which USDA proposes to allow imports of animal products .
